node.title: The Parable of Jesus: Preparing the Way of the Lord
node.description: In the distant past preparing for the coming of an earthly monarch involved repairing the road over which he was to travel.  A king is coming.  Not earthly royalty, or someone of worldly fame.  Does the way need to be prepared for Him?  Find out the answer, and discover what that involves in this weeks message by Pastor Chris Buttery.
